comment: The lectures where never boring if you were interested in the subject! She goes over a chapter per lecture and talks really fast though so make sure to read the chapter before class or else youll be lost. Theres 3 test and a research essay that go to your grade. Test are based on the chapters and the essay is just paraphrasing other people.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Lecture heavy
